dmca.title: Comments Disclaimer  ( Links & Copyrighted Image)
dmca.body:
When searching google.com under my name, Tresa Vorenberg, I found a postcard from my gallery which had been illegally scanned in producing a link to your sight.  This link was made without my permission and needs to be removed immediately, if not sooner.  If you have this completed by Monday, June 7, 2004, legal proceedings and complaints against you will be cancelled.

Please email me at your earliest convenience to assure me that this has been handled.

Thank you very much.

Tresa Vorenberg 

#2



Soforia,

While I appreciate that you are a great fan of my work,  it is illegal to use my name and a link to my business without permission.  I do not appreciate the lack of integrity and personal assumptions made by you in doing that.  Please remove the link to my name, my work and my sight immediately.

Thank you,

Tresa Vorenberg


From: Soforia
Date: Sat, 5 Jun 2004 16:49:58 EDT
To: tvgoldsmiths
Subject: Re: Comments Disclaimer




I am happy to remove it - didn't know it was illegal to advertise your art.    Wanted to share your work with My many fans & there should be a link to YOUR WORK & YOUR SITE.  I have fans from all over the world who enjoy hearing about My many travels and often buy from the merchants I recommend.    When I was in SANTA FE,  I purchased a ring of your design.  I am a great fan of your work.   
 
 
Again - I am happy to remove it - My webworker is in the Netherlands and will remove it  when he wakes up - which is our nighttime.  I hope you are agreeable to that.
 
 
In a message dated 6/5/2004 1:35:50 PM Pacific Standard Time, tvgoldsmiths writes:



Soforia,

When searching google.com under my name, Tresa Vorenberg, I found a postcard from my gallery which had been illegally scanned in producing a link to your sight.  This link was made without my permission and needs to be removed immediately, if not sooner.  If you have this completed by Monday, June 7, 2004, legal proceedings and complaints against you will be cancelled.

Please email me at your earliest convenience to assure me that this has been handled.

Thank you very much.

Tresa Vorenberg 
============================

Received 6/9/2004


Soforia,

In searching
